_description: Contextual PDET enrichment for CL03 Territorio-Ambiente cluster

value_sources: Human rights defender protection context for PA08
OCAD Paz investment data for resource allocation

contextual_notes: PDET municipalities in this policy area focus on territorial economic development
Key indicators include formal enterprises, agricultural productivity, and market access
Relevant PDET pillars: Land formalization (1), Economic reactivation (6), Food security (7)
PDET municipalities face significant challenges protecting social leaders
Key indicators include defenders security, justice access, and human rights violations tracking
Relevant PDET pillar: Reconciliation and peacebuilding (8)
Special attention to ethnic territories and rural areas with armed conflict presence

territorial_context.legal_basis: Acuerdo de Paz Punto 1 + Decreto Ley 893/2017

for_diagnosis: Use PDET municipality data to contextualize baseline indicators
Reference multidimensional poverty rates and fiscal autonomy levels
Consider ethnic composition when analyzing territorial challenges
for_targeting: Filter questions by relevant PDET subregions for territorial specificity
Prioritize municipalities with high poverty rates or low fiscal autonomy
Consider PATR initiatives and active route initiatives as capacity indicators
for_resource_allocation: Reference OCAD Paz investment data for co-financing opportunities
Consider existing PDET pillar investments when planning new initiatives
Analyze gaps between PATR initiatives and active implementation
for_protection_strategies: PA08: Identify high-risk territories for social leader protection
PA08: Cross-reference with ethnic territories requiring differentiated approaches
PA08: Consider armed conflict dynamics in protection planning

example_1.pdet_context: Use municipality multidimensional poverty rates as benchmark for DESC indicators
example_1.expected_enrichment: Compare plan baselines against PDET municipal averages

example_2.pdet_context: Cross-reference plan budgets with OCAD Paz investment data
example_2.expected_enrichment: Identify co-financing opportunities and resource gaps

example_3.integration_point: Theory of change for leader protection
example_3.pdet_context: Use PA08 subregion context to validate protection strategies
example_3.expected_enrichment: Ensure protection strategies account for territorial armed conflict dynamics
